{
  "id": "$activity.definition_activity_02CF9KUAELCBG7E0LU452b6PKd5ezzCt4gb.output.variable_workflow_026R3ITFC3HIF0D3EmshjkHgtAVGHYBZ99A$",

  "base_type": "workflow",
  "name": "WF-from Blank Temp-$workflow.definition_workflow_029OMCNVN37DQ3NROyDjsMiaAAWZSzEGrAU.output.instance_id$",
  "title": "WF-from Blank Temp-$workflow.definition_workflow_029OMCNVN37DQ3NROyDjsMiaAAWZSzEGrAU.output.instance_id$",
  "valid": true,
  "properties": {
    "atomic": {
      "is_atomic": false
    },
    "delete_workflow_instance": false,
    "runtime_user": {
      "target_default": true
    },
    "target": {
      "no_target": true
    },
    "display_name": "WF-from Blank Temp-$workflow.definition_workflow_029OMCNVN37DQ3NROyDjsMiaAAWZSzEGrAU.output.instance_id$",
    "wf_metadata": {
      "coa": {
        "intent": "incident_response",
        "action": [
            "alert",
            "allow",
            "augment",
            "contain",
            "delete",
            "deny",
            "detonate",
            "distill",
            "get",
            "investigate",
            "locate",
            "mitigate",
            "modify",
            "move",
            "notify",
            "other",
            "pause",
            "query",
            "redirect",
            "remediate",
            "report",
            "response",
            "restore",
            "resume",
            "save",
            "scan",
            "set",
            "snapshot",
            "start",
            "stop",
            "substitute",
            "sync",
            "throttle",
            "update"
          ],
        "observable_types": [
          "$activity.definition_activity_02CF9KUAEFZOI07N3FayKHXDEMm2RVuh8ul.input.source_array[@].Observable_Type_Values$"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "categories": [],
  "variables": null
}
